title: Alight
summary: Second Game - Explore a haunted school through eerie VHS surveillance footages.
description: Alight was the first project I truly overscoped. The original plan was to create a full-length, 20-hours walking simulator inspired by Detention by Red Candle and Little Nightmares II by Tarsier Studios. It was also my first game after returning to development following a 4–5 year break. The result was messy and buggy—built on top of poor organization that made it hard to scale. Through this project, I learned the importance of keeping a clean structure to make a game actually work.
